--- title: "ReproRes Poll Class 02" output: flexdashboard::flex_dashboard: orientation: rows vertical_layout: scroll theme: yeti --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: 35 Participants Row {data-height=400} ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ### How did you engage with Chapter 2? ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: Row {data-height=400} ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ### What parts of Skills Self-Assessment did you find challenging or impossible? ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ### How did you engage with the Skills Self-Assessment? ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: Row {data-height=400} ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ### How are you accessing RStudio? ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ### Have you been studying in a group? ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: Row {data-height=400} ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ### List concepts you learned in Chapters 1 and 2 that you feel confident about. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ### List concepts you learned in Chapters 1 and 2 that you feel less confident about and would like reviewed in class today. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](poll-02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: Row {data-height=600} ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Confident ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
